fullForm: Institute of Rural Management Anand Post Graduate Diploma in Management (Rural Management) Admission
eligibility: Bachelorâ€™s degree in any discipline from a recognized university with at least 50% aggregate marks (45% for SC/ST/DAP/OBC-NC/EWS/PwD). Final-year students can apply but must submit proof of degree completion by September 2025. Candidates must also have valid CAT, XAT, or CMAT scores.

faqs.question: What is the selection process for IRMA PGDM (RM) admission?
faqs.answer: Candidates must apply online and submit valid CAT, XAT, or CMAT scores. Shortlisted candidates are called for IRMAWAT (Written Ability Test) and a Personal Interview. Final selection is based on entrance exam scores, IRMAWAT, PI, academic performance, work experience, and diversity factors.
